rice_blast.name: Blas Pade
rice_blast.description: Blas niki penyakit jamur sak ganas leq pade. Gejalane arak bercaq belah ketupat leq daun. Pade bise mate mun ndaq te urus.
rice_blast.symptoms: Bercaq belah ketupat, leher malai patah

rice_brown_spot.name: Bercaq Coklat Pade
rice_brown_spot.description: Penyakit niki tande tanaq kuran sehat. Gejalane bercaq coklat leq daun pade. Gabeq bise jari ampaq.

rice_bacterial_leaf_blight.name: Kresek (Hawar Daun)
rice_bacterial_leaf_blight.description: Penyakit Kresek niki bahaye leq musim hujan. Daun pade nguning terus ngering leman pinggir. Bise nular lewat aeq ujan.

rice_sheath_blight.name: Busuk Pelepah
rice_sheath_blight.description: Pelepah daun pade busuk, wernane abu-abu. Mun parah, pade bise rebah.

rice_tungro.name: Tungro
rice_tungro.description: Penyakit Tungro gara-gara wereng hijau. Daun pade jari kuning oranye, pade jari kerdil ndek mauk mauk gabeq.

rice_stem_rot.name: Busuk Batang
rice_stem_rot.description: Batang pade busuk leq bawaq, paran niki mauk rebah.

corn_downy_mildew.name: Bulai Jagung
corn_downy_mildew.description: Penyakit Bulai niki paling takutin petani jagung. Daun jari putiq bejalur-jalur. Jagung ndek mauk bebuah.

corn_leaf_blight.name: Hawar Daun Jagung
corn_leaf_blight.description: Bercaq panjang abu-abu leq daun jagung. Ngaruh leq hasil panen.

corn_rust.name: Karat Jagung
corn_rust.description: Daun jagung arak bintil-bintil werna coklat maraq karat besi.

corn_stalk_rot.name: Busuk Batang Jagung
corn_stalk_rot.description: Batang jagung busuk, lembek, teros rebah.

corn_ear_rot.name: Busuk Tongkol
corn_ear_rot.description: Tongkol jagung bejamur, werna jambon atao item. Ndek bagu te kakan.

corn_smut.name: Gosong Jagung
corn_smut.description: Arak benjolan (tumor) isi debu item leq jagung.

chili_anthracnose.name: Patek (Antraknosa)
chili_anthracnose.description: Penyakit Patek niki musuh petani sebie. Buaq sebie busuk, arak bercaq lekuk werna item/oranye.

chili_bacterial_wilt.name: Layu Bakteri
chili_bacterial_wilt.description: Sebie layu tib-tibe padahal daun masih hijau. Batang mun te potong keluaq aeq butek.

chili_fusarium_wilt.name: Layu Fusarium
chili_fusarium_wilt.description: Sebie layu pelan-pelan, daun nguning leman bawaq. Akarne busuk.

chili_cercospora_leaf_spot.name: Bercaq Daun Mata Katak
chili_cercospora_leaf_spot.description: Bercaq bulet leq daun, tengaqne abu-abu tepi item. Daun rontok.

chili_powdery_mildew.name: Embun Tepung
chili_powdery_mildew.description: Arak tipung putiq leq bawaq daun sebie. Daun nggulung terus rontok.

chili_yellow_leaf_curl.name: Virus Kuning (Gemini)
chili_yellow_leaf_curl.description: Daun sebie keriting dait werna kuning. Taneman kerdil ndek mauk buaq. Gara-gara kutu kebul.

chili_phytophthora_blight.name: Busuk Batang/Akar
chili_phytophthora_blight.description: Penyakit maut leq musim ujan. Akar busuk, batang item, buaq busuk.

tomato_late_blight.name: Busuk Daun
tomato_late_blight.description: Penyakit leq hawuq dingin dait basah. Daun item busuk, buaq milu busuk.

tomato_yellow_leaf_curl.name: Virus Kuning Tomat
tomato_yellow_leaf_curl.description: Daun tomat ngeriting ke atas, werna kuning. Ndek mauk bebuah.

tomato_blossom_end_rot.name: Busuk Pantat Buah
tomato_blossom_end_rot.description: Buaq tomat item leq ujungne. Gara-gara kurang Kalsium.

onion_purple_blotch.name: Trotol / Bercaq Ungu
onion_purple_blotch.description: Daun bawang arak bercaq ungu, terus patah. Bawang ndek mauk gede.

onion_fusarium_basal_rot.name: Moler
onion_fusarium_basal_rot.description: Daun bawang melintir kuning, akar busuk. Ndek laku te jual.

onion_anthracnose.name: Otomatis (Antraknosa)
onion_anthracnose.description: Bawang mate mendadak. Leher batang busuk.

soybean_rust.name: Karat Kedelai
soybean_rust.description: Daun kedelai arak bintik merah, cepet rontok.

peanut_leaf_spot.name: Bercaq Daun Kacang
peanut_leaf_spot.description: Daun kacang arak bercaq item, kuning teros rontok.

banana_fusarium_wilt.name: Layu Pisang
banana_fusarium_wilt.description: Gedang layu, daun kuning nunduk. Batang dalemne werna coklat.

banana_sigatoka.name: Sigatoka
banana_sigatoka.description: Daun gedang arak garis-garis item ngering.

banana_bunchy_top.name: Kerdil Pisang
banana_bunchy_top.description: Daun gedang numpuk leq atas, kerdil.

mango_anthracnose.name: Antraknosa Mangga
mango_anthracnose.description: Buaq mangga arak bercaq item, cepet busuk.

cabbage_clubroot.name: Akar Gada
cabbage_clubroot.description: Akar kol bengkak jari gede. Taneman layu.
